subject: Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: Whichever horse he ends up on in the Belmont Stakes, Mine That Bird or Rachel Alexandra, Calvin Borel could become the first jockey to sweep the Triple Crown on different horses.
snippet: Whichever horse he ends up on in the Belmont Stakes, Mine That Bird or Rachel Alexandra, Calvin Borel could become the first jockey to sweep the Triple Crown on different horses.
